column2: * Job description for Business Development Executive* Experience : Minimum 1 year in Human Resource (Staffing and Recruitment industry) Location : Marathahalli, Bangalore-560037 Work Mode : Work from Office Working Day : Monday to Saturday Working Time: Day Shift (09:00am to 06:00pm) Description We are seeking a dynamic and proactive Business Development Executive to join our Staffing & Recruitment firm. The primary focus of this role is to drive lead generation efforts, Identify and fix meetings with potential clients, and attend meetings as needed to promote our services and secure new business opportunities. The ideal candidate will be an individual contributor  with excellent communication skills and a strong ability to identify and pursue new business leads. Responsibilities: Lead Generation: Conduct thorough market research to identify potential clients and industries that align with the company's services. Utilize various lead generation techniques and tools such as cold calling, email outreach, networking events, and leveraging online platforms to attract potential clients. Qualify leads to ensure alignment with the company's target market and services. Meeting Fixing: Engage with prospective clients through phone calls, emails, and other communication channels to introduce the company's services and qualify leads. Schedule and coordinate meetings with potential clients, ensuring all relevant parties are informed and prepared. Manage calendars to ensure smooth scheduling and attendance of meetings. Meeting Attendance: Attend meetings with potential clients to represent the company and present its capabilities, services, and value proposition. Act as a knowledgeable point of contact during meetings, addressing any questions or concerns and providing relevant information to potential clients. Collaborate with internal teams to tailor presentations and proposals to the specific needs and requirements of potential clients. Relationship Building: Build and nurture relationships with potential clients, decision-makers, and key stakeholders within target organizations. Maintain regular communication with leads to keep them engaged and informed about the company's offerings and value. Reporting and Documentation: Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of all interactions, leads, meetings, and opportunities in the company's CRM system. Generate reports and provide insights on lead generation activities, meeting outcomes, and potential client engagement to inform decision-making processes. Continuous Improvement: Stay updated on industry trends, competitor activities, and market developments to identify new opportunities and refine lead generation strategies. Seek feedback from meetings and interactions with potential clients to continuously improve the company's approach and offerings. Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in business, marketing, or related field. Proven experience in business development, lead generation, or sales roles, preferably within the Human Resource (Staffing and Recruitment)industry or professional services industry. Strong communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to articulate complex ideas clearly and persuasively. Excellent interpersonal skills and the ability to build rapport and establish relationships with clients. Self-motivated with a results-oriented mindset and the ability to work independently as well as part of a team. Highly organized with excellent time management skills and the ability to prioritize tasks effectively. Proficiency in using CRM software and other sales tools to track leads, opportunities, and activities. Willingness to travel as needed for client meetings and business development activities.
column11: Client onboarding, New Client Acquisition, New Business Development, business develop, Business Development, New Business

column2: Are you interested in working in the field of education and want to be a part of a dynamic and fast-paced team? Look no further, as Chandigarh University is currently seeking an Admission Manager/Admission Executives for our Gorakhpur location. The ideal candidate will have a passion for helping students achieve their academic and professional goals and will play a key role in the university's mission to provide access to high-quality education.    Position: Admission Manager/Admission Executives    Location: Gorakhpur    Company: Chandigarh University    Responsibilities:    1. Lead the admission team in Gorakhpur and oversee the entire admission process for the university programs.  2. Develop and implement effective admission strategies to attract prospective students to the university.  3. Build and maintain strong relationships with local high schools, colleges, and educational institutions to promote awareness of the university's programs.  4. Manage and coordinate admission events, including open houses, information sessions, and campus tours.  5. Provide guidance and support to prospective students and their families throughout the admission process, including assisting with applications, financial aid, and enrollment.  6. Collaborate with university departments to ensure a smooth transition for admitted students, including academic advising and orientation.  7. Stay abreast of industry trends and best practices in admissions and enrollment management to continuously improve and enhance the admission process and student experience.    Qualifications:    1. Bachelor?? degree in a relevant field, with a master's degree preferred.  2. At least 5 years of experience in admissions, recruitment, or related fields, with a proven track record of meeting or exceeding enrollment goals.  3. Strong leadership and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively manage a team and build relationships with prospective students and their families.  4. Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to articulate the value of a university education and the benefits of attending Chandigarh University.  5. A passion for education and a dedication to helping students succeed in their academic and professional endeavors.  6. Familiarity with admission processes and best practices, as well as knowledge of the educational landscape in Gorakhpur and surrounding areas.    Join our team and be a part of transforming lives through education. Chandigarh University offers a competitive salary and benefits package, as well as opportunities for professional growth and advancement. If you are passionate about higher education and want to make a positive impact in the lives of students, we encourage you to apply for the Admission Manager/Admission Executives role in Gorakhpur today. We look forward to welcoming you to the Chandigarh University family!

column2: Job Description for HR IT Recruiter Location: Marathahalli, Bangalore  Company: AMPUG Solutions Job Type: Full-Time Experience: Min. 6 months  Description: We are seeking a dynamic and motivated IT Recruiter with 6 months to 2 years of experience to join our growing recruitment team. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of the IT landscape and possess the skills necessary to identify and attract top talent in the industry. This is an excellent opportunity for someone looking to advance their career in IT recruitment within a consultancy setting. Key Responsibilities: - Talent Acquisition:  - Source, screen, and interview candidates for various IT positions.  - Utilize various recruiting methods including job boards, social media, and networking events.  - Develop and maintain a pipeline of qualified candidates. - Client Management:  - Work closely with clients to understand their hiring needs and job specifications.  - Build and maintain strong relationships with clients to ensure a clear understanding of their current and future recruitment needs. - Consultancy Support:  - Provide recruitment consultancy services to clients, advising on hiring strategies and market trends.  - Conduct market research to stay updated on industry trends and salary benchmarks. - Candidate Management:  - Manage candidate experience from initial contact through to offer acceptance and onboarding.  - Conduct background checks and reference checks as needed. - Administrative Duties:  - Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of all recruitment activities in the Applicant Tracking System (ATS).  - Prepare regular reports on recruitment activities and outcomes. Requirements: - Experience:  - 6 months to 2 years of experience in IT recruitment, preferably within a consultancy environment. - Skills:  - Strong understanding of the IT industry and various technical roles.  - Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.  - Ability to build and maintain strong relationships with clients and candidates.  - Proficient in using recruiting software and Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS).  - Strong organizational skills and attention to detail. -  Education :  - Bachelors degree in Human Resources, Information Technology, Business Administration, or related field is preferred. Preferred Qualifications: - Experience in high-volume recruiting. - Familiarity with various sourcing techniques. - Certification in HR or recruitment (e.g., PHR, SHRM-CP) is a plus. What We Offer: - Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses. - Comprehensive benefits package including health, dental, and vision insurance. - Opportunities for professional growth and career advancement. - A supportive and collaborative work environment. --- If you are a proactive and dedicated IT Recruiter looking to join a dynamic consultancy, we encourage you to apply. Bring your expertise and enthusiasm to our team and help us connect top talent with exciting opportunities in the IT industry.

column2: We are in a really exciting phase of growth and want bright and passionate problem solvers and first principle thinkers to come join us in our recently initiated Strategy & Ops (Founders Office) team to deeply understand the challenges of the user and convert these into meaningful solutions. In this role you will work on priority problem statements specifically focused on revenue, growth, and overall business strategy. This role is for generalists who are open to wearing multiple hats across the workplace and work in a challenging fast-paced environment   along with the founders / other senior management. The role will be ideal for people contemplating further studies such as an MBA or looking to start up at that point in their career,   or also move into a specific function within the company itself.         Key     Responsibilities         Working directly with the Founders and Functional Leaders in driving key strategic priorities for the Founders Office - will entail owning key problem statements / projects across various functions like strategy, business operations, monetisation and profitability, 0 to 1 initiatives, etc. while working with teams to drive them to execution. Specific examples - Strategy for improving an existing revenue stream or building a new one, GTM strategy for new district / initiative,business planning, etc.   Manage or work with entire team across functions such as classifieds, product, content, brand sales, and marketing to deep dive into problems for the business, derive business insights, and inform execution planning   Identify and prioritise medium-long term projects that can deliver non-linear growth in scale of business and / or revenues         Skills     Needed     We are looking for a young, high-energy and driven professional who is ready to dive into a hyper-growth start-up and contribute towards the next 10x growth journey in the Next Billion Users (NBU) space of Consumer-Tech. More specifically:   Great problem solving and analytical skills - Ability to breakdown complex problems into smaller pieces and layout clear game plans to solve and execute   Comfort with ambiguity - Ability to work on ambiguous problem statements / ambiguous environments and lead the way to structure and define a clear path for execution   High sense of ownership and initiative - Strong ability to drive execution while having high ownership for owned mandates and furthermore, ability to identify problems / opportunities and take initiative to drive them towards impact   Strong stakeholder & team management skills - Ability to manage stakeholders across levels and teams to deliver on tight execution plans   Excellent written and verbal communication skills - You will set the agenda in critical meetings and will need to drive action effectively         Qualifications       MBA / Undergraduate degree from a top-tier college   6 months to 1 year relevant FTE/internship experience across top strategy consulting firms and / or tech companies in business strategy and ops roles       Bonus points if you have had exposure to:     6 months to 1 year of experience at a fast paced start up   Managing large scale strategic / transformation projects in your prior role   Roles at the intersection of business, product (consumer / media), and tech   Driving both strategic and tactical decision making

column2: We are looking for an experienced, well connected and organized International Recruitment Manager to join our growing Overseas Team and take our company and platform to the next level.            What youll be doing every day:            Represent ApplyBoard brand to promote ApplyBoard services to agents, international educators, and prospective students          Increase international student enrolment at ApplyBoard by recruiting international students from diverse regions          Negotiate terms of engagement, provide training to agents and their staff, and keep the agent contacts engaged with ApplyBoard through regular communication          Undergo presentations in the local marketplace to further promote ApplyBoard          Train and guide agents to improve the quality and volume of international applicants, ensuring top quality          Disseminate communications and activities online using CRM and social media platforms including delivering key messages and encouraging engagement from potential and current students          Implement marketing and recruitment strategies through research and market analysis to maximize international student outreach          Proactively undergo agent outreach                What you bring to the table:            Fluent in English          Post-secondary education or equivalent experience          Minimum 2 years of international student recruitment experience for secondary and/or post-secondary institutions          Exceptional communication verbal and written skills          Autonomous self-starter, with the ability to work independently within a team-based environment          Aptitude for prioritizing tasks with an attention to detail to ensure information accuracy          Exceptional problem-solving skills under ambiguous circumstances to ensure you provide the best outcome for our students while maintaining integrity with our partner relationships          Experience working with educational consultants and or post-secondary institutions directly; considered a bonus          Experience working with a CRM; considered an asset
column11: Selection process, Market analysis, International recruitment, Social media, Manager Technology, Entrepreneur, Research, Operations, CRM, Recruitment

column2: The Placement Officer and Corporate Relations Coordinator at JKKN Educational Institution will be instrumental in enhancing our placement and corporate engagement initiatives. This role involves managing recruitment processes effectively, fostering robust corporate partnerships both internally and externally, and overseeing administrative duties related to placements, employee relations, and corporate engagements. The successful candidate will also support a positive workplace culture that encourages professional growth and aligns with our institutions overarching goals.             Responsibilities          Placement Management: Facilitate student employment by coordinating recruitment activities, interviews, and career counselling.     Engage with industry professionals to secure job placements and internship opportunities.       Corporate Relations:        Cultivate and maintain strong partnerships with corporations, industry leaders, and alumni. Promote collaborative projects, internships, and academic-industry synergies.       Resource Development:        Conduct research to identify potential employers both locally and internationally.      Develop and maintain a comprehensive database of corporate profiles and their recruitment needs.       Recordkeeping and Documentation:        Keep precise records of student placements and career trajectories.     Generate analytical reports on placement trends and effectiveness.       Administrative Support:        Support the organization of career-focused events and workshops.      Coordinate visits from industry experts and facilitate campus engagement.       Employee Relations:        Nurture positive interactions among students, faculty, and staff regarding placement activities. Address and resolve any concerns related to student placements and career development.           Qualification       Bachelor s degree in Business Administration, Human Resources, Education, Certifications in Career Counselling or Corporate Relations or a related field.     Minimum of 3-5 years of experience in placement services, corporate relations, or career development within an educational or corporate setting.     Proven track record of establishing and maintaining successful corporate partnerships and facilitating student placements.     Strong interpersonal and communication skills to effectively liaise with students, faculty, and corporate partners.     Excellent organizational and administrative abilities to manage multiple tasks and projects simultaneously.     Proficiency in data management and analysis to maintain accurate records and generate insightful reports.     Deep understanding of the job market, recruitment processes, and industry trends.     Familiarity with academic environments and the ability to align corporate needs with educational offerings.     High level of initiative and the ability to work independently as well as collaboratively.     Adaptability and problem-solving skills to address challenges in student placements and corporate engagements.     Commitment to fostering a positive and inclusive work environment that promotes professional growth and aligns with the institution s values.
column11: Administration, Career development, Corporate relations, Career counselling, Data management, Analytical, Corporate, Internship, Employee relations, Recruitment

column2: Effectively Onboard Publishers for Programmatic Advertising business.       Look for publishers as per target groups assigned and onboard them in order to increase the topline revenue     Own up all the tasks pertaining to Onboarding to the extent that we are integrated in Publisher?s inventory and functioning as per commitments to each other.     Monitor Publisher reports, revenue and highlight the issues at the right time to the right stakeholder.     Serving as the main point of contact with the Publishers for questions pertaining to technical issues, delivery of campaigns etc.     Ensure that projects are managed and completed within an established time frame.     Preferably who has worked on technologies like Google Products (DFP, Ad manager 360, DV360), Header Bidding, Open RTB, DMP etc.         Skills Required:         Experience of technologies like Google Products (DFP, Ad manager 360, DV360), Header Bidding, Open RTB, DMP etc.     Publisher Onboarding Experience while working with an AD Network/DSP/Ad Exchange/Ad agency     Experience of trouble shooting issues related to Dip in Publisher performance     Manage Multiple Projects and Relationships Simultaneously     Smart & Presentable     Good Communication Skills

column2: srmb srijan ltd is looking for MARKETING RETAIL to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey     Marketing Strategy Development: Develop comprehensive marketing strategies tailored to the specific needs and goals of the retail business     Analyze market trends, consumer behavior, and competitors to identify opportunities and create impactful marketing plans     Campaign Planning and Execution: Plan, execute, and monitor marketing campaigns across various channels, including digital advertising, social media, email marketing, print media, in-store promotions, and events     Ensure campaigns are delivered on time and within budget     Brand Management: Maintain and reinforce the retail brand's image and identity consistently across all marketing materials and touchpoints     Develop brand guidelines and ensure compliance across various marketing activities     Customer Segmentation and Targeting: Conduct market research to identify and understand target customer segments     Create personalized marketing messages and experiences to engage with different customer groups effectively     Digital Marketing: Oversee digital marketing efforts, including website content, SEO (Search Engine Optimization), SEM (Search Engine Marketing), social media, and online advertising     Optimize online presence and engagement to drive traffic and conversions     Visual Merchandising: Collaborate with visual merchandisers and store management to create appealing and customer-friendly in-store displays that promote products and reinforce the brand's image     Data Analysis and Reporting: Analyze marketing campaign performance using key performance indicators (KPIs) and relevant metrics     Prepare regular reports to evaluate the effectiveness of marketing efforts and make data-driven recommendations for improvement     Promotional Activities: Plan and coordinate promotional events, sales, discounts, and loyalty programs to attract and retain customers and drive sales     Budget Management: Develop and manage marketing budgets effectively, ensuring maximum return on investment (ROI) for marketing activities     Cross-Functional Collaboration: Collaborate with internal teams, such as sales, product management, and creative, to align marketing efforts with overall business objectives     Market Research: Stay updated on industry trends, consumer preferences, and competitor activities to identify potential opportunities and challenges for the retail business
column11: Product management, Data analysis, Brand management, Email marketing, Social media, Market research, SEM, SEO, Digital marketing, Print media
